entry.title: Fighting Rages in Eastern Ukraine as Zelensky Warns of More Russian Missile Attacks
entry.content: Russia is pushing to seize the city of Bakhmut and achieve a symbolic victory, and dismissing claims that it will abandon the Zaporizhzhia nuclear-power plant.

entry.title: Chinese Protests Put Xi Jinpingin a Bind
entry.content: China’s leader faces a difficult choice between loosening his zero-Covid policy or doubling down on restrictions that have stifled the country’s economy.

entry.title: China Covid Protests Lead to Clampdown
entry.content: Police turn out to discourage gatherings in Beijing, Shanghai and Hong Kong as state-media doubles down on Xi Jinping’s zero-tolerance approach to pandemic
